languages.text: Если персонаж в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} перемещается хотя бы на 3 клетки, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} увеличивается на 20% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} перемещается хотя бы на 3 клетки, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} увеличивается на 20% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: Si el portador se mueve al menos 3 casillas por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador se mueve al menos 3 casillas por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間に3セル以上動く場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が+20%上昇する。
languages.original_text: If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間に最低3セル動く場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ドッジ{/g}が +20%上昇する。

languages.text: 如果装备者该本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内至少移动了3格，则获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者该本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内至少移动了3格，则获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Bewegt sich der Träger mindestens 3 Felder pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bewegt sich der Träger mindestens 3 Zellen pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur se déplace d'au moins 3 cases par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +20 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur se déplace d'au moins 3 cases par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +20 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur se déplace d'au moins 3 cases par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +20 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} en az 3 hücre hareket ederse 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} kazanır.
